quote: Not all readers are leaders, but all leaders are readers. – Harry S. Truman
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
joke: Hear about the new restaurant called Karma? There’s no menu: You get what you deserve.
